channel.title: trigonometry on JenkinsDev :: Into the mind of an aspiring polymathic autodidact.
channel.description: Recent content in trigonometry on JenkinsDev :: Into the mind of an aspiring polymathic autodidact.

item.title: Triangle Trigonometric Functions
item.description: Sine Right Triangles sin(θ) = opposite / hypotenuse Non-Right Triangle a / sin(A) = b / sin(B) = c / sin(C) Cosine Right Triangle cos(θ) = adjacent / hypotenuse Tangent Right Triangle tan(θ) = opposite / adjacent
item.content:
Sine

Right Triangles

  • sin(θ) = opposite / hypotenuse

Non-Right Triangle

  • a / sin(A) = b / sin(B) = c / sin(C)

Cosine

Right Triangle

  • cos(θ) = adjacent / hypotenuse

Tangent

Right Triangle

  • tan(θ) = opposite / adjacent
